00045 uvm_manager* uvm_manager::m_mgr = 0;
00046 
00047 uvm_manager* uvm_manager::get_manager() {
00048   if (m_mgr == 0) {
00049     m_mgr = new uvm_manager();
00050   }
00051   return m_mgr;
00052 }
00053 
00054 uvm_manager::uvm_manager() {
00055   m_stop_mode = UVM_SC_STOP;
00056 
00057   sc_time max_time; // the time at which sc_start() returns
00058   sc_time smallest_time = sc_get_time_resolution();
00059 
00060   max_time = SC_MAX_TIME;
00061 
00062   // make the UVM timeouts be slightly less than when sc_start() returns
00063   // such that UVM is able to end the run phase
00064   m_global_timeout = max_time - smallest_time;
00065   m_stop_timeout = max_time - smallest_time;
00066 }
00067  
00068 uvm_manager::~uvm_manager() {
00069 }

00072 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00073 // Function: find_component
00074 //   Regular expression search for UVM components base on instance name.  Returns
00075 //   the first match found.
00076 //
00077 // Parameters;
00078 //  @param name - name to search for
00079 //
00080 // Returns:
00081 //  @param comp - pointer to uvm component found, NULL if no matching.
00082 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00083 uvm_component* uvm_manager::find_component(const char* name) {
00084     bool           bfound = false;
00085     uvm_component* comp   = NULL;
00086     sc_simcontext* simc_p = sc_get_curr_simcontext();
00087     sc_object*     obj    = simc_p->first_object();
00088 
00089     uvmsc_boost::smatch what;
00090     uvmsc_boost::regex  re(name);
00091 
00092     obj = simc_p->first_object();
00093     while ((obj != NULL) && (bfound == false))
00094     {
00095         comp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(obj);
00096         if ((comp != NULL) &&
00097                 uvmsc_boost::regex_match((const std::string) obj->name(), what, re))
00098         {
00099             bfound = true;
00100         }
00101         obj = simc_p->next_object();
00102     }
00103     return comp;
00104 }
00105 
00106 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00107 // Function: find_module
00108 // 
00109 // Regular expression search for OVM components base on type name.  Returns
00110 // the first match.
00111 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00112 uvm_component* uvm_manager::find_module(const char* name) {
00113   bool           bfound = false;
00114   uvm_component* comp   = NULL;
00115   sc_simcontext* simc_p = sc_get_curr_simcontext();
00116   sc_object*     obj    = simc_p->first_object();
00117 
00118   uvmsc_boost::smatch what;
00119   uvmsc_boost::regex  re(name);
00120   
00121   while ((obj != NULL) && (bfound == false))
00122   {
00123     comp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(obj);
00124     if ((comp != NULL) &&
00125         uvmsc_boost::regex_match(comp->get_type_name(), what, re))
00126     {
00127         bfound = true;
00128     }
00129     obj = simc_p->next_object();
00130   }
00131   return comp;
00132 
00133 }

00135 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00136 // Function: find_all
00137 // 
00138 // Regular expression search for OVM components base on instance name.  Returns
00139 // a vector of all components that match the search criteria.  Default is to
00140 // return all components.
00141 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00142 std::vector<uvm_component*> uvm_manager::find_all(const char* name) {
00143   std::vector<uvm_component*> comp_vector;
00144   uvm_component* comp   = NULL;
00145   sc_simcontext* simc_p = sc_get_curr_simcontext();
00146   sc_object*     obj    = simc_p->first_object();
00147 
00148   uvmsc_boost::smatch what;
00149   uvmsc_boost::regex  re(name);
00150   
00151   while (obj != NULL)
00152   {
00153     comp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(obj);
00154     if ((comp != NULL) &&
00155         uvmsc_boost::regex_match((const std::string) obj->name(), what, re))
00156     {
00157         comp_vector.push_back(comp);
00158     }
00159     obj = simc_p->next_object();
00160   }
00161   return comp_vector;
00162 
00163 }

00169 // a vector of all components that match the search criteria.
00170 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00171 std::vector<uvm_component*> uvm_manager::find_all_module(const char* name) {
00172   std::vector<uvm_component*> comp_vector;
00173   uvm_component* comp   = NULL;
00174   sc_simcontext* simc_p = sc_get_curr_simcontext();
00175   sc_object*     obj    = simc_p->first_object();
00176 
00177   uvmsc_boost::smatch what;
00178   uvmsc_boost::regex  re(name);
00179   
00180   while (obj != NULL)
00181   {
00182     comp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(obj);
00183     if ((comp != NULL) &&
00184         uvmsc_boost::regex_match(comp->get_type_name(), what, re))
00185     {
00186         comp_vector.push_back(comp);
00187     }
00188     obj = simc_p->next_object();
00189   }
00190   return comp_vector;
00191 
00192 }

00195   m_stop_mode = mode;

00202 void uvm_manager::set_global_stop_timeout(sc_time t) {

00205 
00206 void uvm_manager::wait_for_global_timeout() {
00207   
00208   sc_time tdur = m_global_timeout - sc_time_stamp();
00209 
00210   wait(tdur);
00211 
00212   // global timeout has expired => run phase has ended
00213 
00214   end_run_phase();
00215 }
00216 
00217 void uvm_manager::stop_request() {
00218 
00219   sc_spawn_options o;
00220 
00221   MARK_THREAD_INVISIBLE(o);
00222 
00223   // first spawn thread that will wait for m_stop_timeout to expire
00224   sc_spawn(sc_bind(&uvm_manager::wait_for_stop_timeout, this),
00225            "uvm_wait_for_stop_timeout",
00226             &o
00227   );
00228 
00229   // spawn helper process that will spawn all the stop tasks
00230   // and wait for spawned hierarchy to terminate
00231  
00232   sc_spawn(sc_bind(&uvm_manager::stop_spawner, this),
00233            "uvm_stop_spawner",
00234            &o
00235   );
00236 }
00237 
00238 void uvm_manager::wait_for_stop_timeout() {
00239 
00240   sc_time tdur = m_stop_timeout - sc_time_stamp();
00241 
00242   wait(tdur);
00243 
00244   // stop timeout has expired => run phase has ended
00245   end_run_phase();
00246 
00247 }
00248 
00249 void uvm_manager::stop_spawner() {
00250 
00251   // find all top-level modules and spawn stop on each top module hierarchy
00252 
00253   const std::vector<sc_object*>& tops = sc_get_top_level_objects();
00254   for (unsigned i = 0; i < tops.size(); i++) {
00255     sc_object* top = tops[i];
00256     sc_module* top_mod = DCAST<sc_module*>(top);
00257     if (top_mod) {
00258       spawn_stop(top_mod);
00259     }
00260   }
00261 
00262   // wait for all stop processes to terminate
00263 
00264   if (m_join_stop.process_count() > 0) {
00265     m_join_stop.wait();
00266   }
00267 
00268   // all stop tasks have returned => 
00269   // 1. call kill() on all uvm_components 
00270   // 2. end run phase
00271 
00272   do_kill_all();
00273   end_run_phase();
00274 }
00275 
00276 void uvm_manager::spawn_stop(sc_module* mod) {
00277 
00278   sc_simcontext* context = sc_get_curr_simcontext();
00279 
00280   // spawn mod::stop() if mod is an uvm_component, and
00281   // it overrode enable_stop_interrupt() to return true;
00282   // spawn mod::stop() as a child of mod
00283 
00284   uvm_component* comp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(mod);
00285   if (comp && comp->enable_stop_interrupt()) {
00286 
00287     // check if this component already has a child called "stop"
00288 
00289     std::string nm = std::string(mod->name()) + std::string(".stop");
00290     if (sc_find_object(nm.c_str())) {
00291       char msg[1048];
00292       sprintf(msg, "\nuvm_component is %s", mod->name()); 
00293       SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_MULTIPLE_STOP_PROCS_, msg);
00294     }
00295 
00296     sc_process_b* proc = sc_get_current_process_b();
00297     context->hierarchy_push(mod);
00298     RESET_PROC_EXTERN(proc);
00299     sc_process_handle stop_handle = 
00300       sc_spawn(sc_bind(&uvm_component::stop, comp), "stop");
00301     context->hierarchy_pop();
00302     SET_PROC_EXTERN(proc);
00303     m_join_stop.add_process(stop_handle);
00304   }
00305 
00306   // recurse over children
00307 
00308   const std::vector<sc_object*>& children = mod->get_child_objects();
00309   for (unsigned i = 0; i < children.size(); i++) {
00310     sc_object* child = children[i];
00311     sc_module* mod_child = DCAST<sc_module*>(child);
00312     if (mod_child) {
00313       spawn_stop(mod_child);
00314     }
00315   }
00316 }
00317 
00318 void uvm_manager::end_run_phase() {
00319 
00320   static bool invoked = false; 
00321 
00322   if (!invoked) {
00323     invoked = true;
00324   } else {
00325     // end_run_phase() has already been called;
00326     // this can happen if uvm_stop_request has been called 
00327     // but the stop processes do not all return; then global_timeout and
00328     // stop_timeout will expire at same time, and both will call 
00329     // end_run_phase() 
00330     return;
00331   }
00332 
00333   // do the post-run phases
00334 
00335   do_extract_all();
00336   do_check_all();
00337   do_report_all();
00338 
00339   // call sc_stop() if m_stop_mode is set appropriately 
00340 
00341   if (m_stop_mode == UVM_SC_STOP) {
00342     sc_stop();
00343   }
00344   
00345 }
00346 
00347 void uvm_manager::do_kill_all() {
00348 
00349   // find all top-level modules and call kill on each top module hierarchy
00350 
00351   const std::vector<sc_object*>& tops = sc_get_top_level_objects();
00352   for (unsigned i = 0; i < tops.size(); i++) {
00353     sc_object* top = tops[i];
00354     sc_module* top_mod = DCAST<sc_module*>(top);
00355     if (top_mod) {
00356       do_kill(top_mod);
00357     }
00358   }
00359 }
00360 
00361 void uvm_manager::do_kill(sc_module* mod) {
00362 
00363   // call mod::kill() if mod is an uvm_component
00364 
00365   uvm_component* comp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(mod);
00366   if (comp) {
00367     comp->kill();
00368   }
00369 
00370   // recurse over children
00371 
00372   const std::vector<sc_object*>& children = mod->get_child_objects();
00373   for (unsigned i = 0; i < children.size(); i++) {
00374     sc_object* child = children[i];
00375     sc_module* mod_child = DCAST<sc_module*>(child);
00376     if (mod_child) {
00377       do_kill(mod_child);
00378     }
00379   }
00380 }

00383 
00384   // find all top-level modules and call extract on each top module hierarchy
00385 
00386   const std::vector<sc_object*>& tops = sc_get_top_level_objects();
00387   for (unsigned i = 0; i < tops.size(); i++) {
00388     sc_object* top = tops[i];
00389     sc_module* top_mod = DCAST<sc_module*>(top);
00390     if (top_mod) {
00391       do_extract(top_mod);
00392     }
00393   }
00394 }

00396 void uvm_manager::do_extract(sc_module* mod) {
00397 
00398   // call mod::extract() if mod is an uvm_component
00399 
00400   uvm_component* comp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(mod);
00401   if (comp) {
00402     comp->extract();
00403   }
00404 
00405   // recurse over children
00406 
00407   const std::vector<sc_object*>& children = mod->get_child_objects();
00408   for (unsigned i = 0; i < children.size(); i++) {
00409     sc_object* child = children[i];
00410     sc_module* mod_child = DCAST<sc_module*>(child);
00411     if (mod_child) {
00412       do_extract(mod_child);
00413     }
00414   }
00415 }

00487 void uvm_manager::set_top(sc_core::sc_module *comp)
00488 {
00489   m_tops.push_back(comp);
00490 }
00491 
00492 std::vector<uvm_component*> uvm_manager::get_uvm_component_tops()
00493 {
00494   std::vector<uvm_component*> tops;
00495   uvm_component * pcomp;
00496 
00497   for (int i = 0; i < m_tops.size(); i++)
00498   {
00499     pcomp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(m_tops[i]);
00500     if (pcomp != NULL)
00501         tops.push_back(pcomp);
00502   }
00503 
00504   return tops;
00505 }
00506 
00507 std::vector<sc_core::sc_module*> uvm_manager::get_tops()
00508 {
00509   return m_tops;
00510 }

00512 unsigned int uvm_manager::get_num_tops()
